Class TicketMiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicketMiner
  • public class TicketMiner
extends java.lang.Object
    The TicketMiner class manages ticket fees and revenue calculation for events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double computeCharityRevenue()
      Computes the total revenue earned from chairty fees across all events.
      double computeConvenienceRevenue()
      Computes the total revenue earned from convenience fees across all events.
      double computeRevenue()
      Computes the total revenue earned from collected fees across all events.
      double computeServiceRevenue()
      Computes the total revenue earned from service fees across all events.
      double getAllFees​(int ticketAmount, double ticketPrice)
      Calculates and returns the total fees for an event based on ticket amount and price.

      Calculates and returns the charity fee based on the number of tickets and ticket price.

      Initializes the collected fees for each event.

      • getAllFees

        public double getAllFees​(int ticketAmount,
                         double ticketPrice)
        Calculates and returns the total fees for an event based on ticket amount and price.
        Parameters:
        ticketAmount - The number of tickets sold.
        ticketPrice - The price per ticket.
        Returns:
        The total fees (convenience, service, and charity) for the given ticket amount and price.

      • getConvenienceFee

        Returns:

      • getServiceFee

                            double ticketPrice)
        Calculates and returns the service fee based on the number of tickets and ticket price.
        Parameters:
        ticketAmount - The number of tickets.
        ticketPrice - The price per ticket.
        Returns:
        The service fee.

      • getCharityFee

        public double getCharityFee​(int ticketAmount,
                            double ticketPrice)

        Parameters:
        ticketAmount - The number of tickets.
        ticketPrice - The price per ticket.
        Returns:
        The charity fee.

      • initializeCollectedFees

        public void initializeCollectedFees​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Event> eventMap)
        Initializes the collected fees for each event. If the eventId's inner HashMap doesn't exist, it creates a new one and initializes specific fee types for the eventId.

      • updateConvenienceFees

        public void updateConvenienceFees​(int eventId)
        Updates the convenience fees for a specific event based on the convenience fee value.
        Parameters:
        eventId - The ID of the event.
